basic_info.description:
üëã My name is Changxu HUANG, and I have been a junior web developer for one year. I discovered this profession during a conference and was immediately passionate about the process of creating a website, which combines logic, programming, and a sense of design.

I then pursued web development training at OpenClassrooms, where I learned the fundamentals of algorithms and their application in various programming languages. Today, I mainly work on the front-end using JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and React, while also using Node.js and Express for back-end tasks. I have completed several personal projects in both front-end and back-end, which allowed me to consolidate my skills and develop a comprehensive approach to web development.
